partintro.para: Interbase is a popular database put out by Borland/Inprise. More information about Interbase is available at http://www.interbase.com. Oh, by the way, Interbase just joined the open source movement!

refnamediv.refpurpose: Open a connection to an Interbase database

refsect1.title: Description
Description
refsect1.simpara: Opens a persistent connection to an Interbase database.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Close a connection to an Interbase database

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Close a connection to an Interbase database. This function takes a connection id returned from ibase_connect.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Execute a query on an Interbase database

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.simpara: Performs a query on a Interbase database, returning a result identifier for use with ibase_fetch_row, ibase_free_result and ibase_free_query.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Fetch a row from an Interbase database

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.simpara: Returns the next row specified by the result identifier obtained using the ibase_query.

refsect1.title: Description
Description
refsect1.simpara: Free's a result set the has been created by ibase_query.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Prepare a query for later binding of parameter placeholders and execution.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.simpara: Prepare a query for later binding of parameter placeholders (via ibase_bind) and execution (via ibase_execute).

refnamediv.refpurpose: Bind placeholder parameters from a previously prepared query

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.simpara: Bind Parameters from a query prepared by ibase_prepare.

note.para: ibase_bind is currently not functional in PHP4

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.simpara: Execute a query prepared (and perhaps binded) by ibase_prepare and ibase_bind.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Free memory allocated by a prepared query

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.simpara: Free a query prepared by ibase_prepare.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Sets the format of datetime columns returned from queries.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.simpara: Sets the format of the datetime columns returned from queries.

note.para: ibase_timefmt is currently not functional in PHP4
